mapper.insert: INSERT INTO savings_product (savings_product_code, bank_id, savings_product_name, savings_product_type, savings_product_term, savings_product_rate, savings_product_max_rate) VALUES (#{savingsProductCode}, #{bankId}, #{savingsProductName}, #{savingsProductType}, #{savingsProductTerm}, #{savingsProductRate}, #{savingsProductMaxRate})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM savings_product WHERE bank_id = #{bankId} ORDER BY savings_product_max_rate DESC, CASE WHEN #{finTypeCode} = 1 OR #{finTypeCode} = 3 THEN savings_product_term ELSE 9999 END ASC, CASE WHEN #{finTypeCode} = 2 OR #{finTypeCode} = 4 THEN savings_product_term ELSE 0 END DESC LIMIT 2
